113.26.text: It scared me, it energized me,

124.26.text: a thing that could move fast,

242.26.text: Well my stomach -- it was my stomach I hated.

251.26.text: or able to fit into the predetermined corporate image in shape.

410.26.text: was the crisis in the world,

416.26.text: Suddenly, my cancer was a cancer that was everywhere,

419.26.text: the cancer of cruelty, the cancer of greed,

422.26.text: the cancer that gets inside people

424.26.text: who live down the streets from chemical plants -- and they're usually poor --

428.26.text: the cancer inside the coal miner's lungs,
